TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CustomAttributeNamedArgument extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示仅反射上下文中的自定义属性的命名自变量。

span.span: Represents a named argument of a custom attribute in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在检查仅反射上下文中的代码不能执行，因此它并不总是可以检查自定义特性，通过创建它们，然后检查其属性、 使用等方法实例， ，依次类推.Code that is being examined in the reflection-only context cannot be executed, so it is not always possible to examine custom attributes by creating instances of them and then examining their properties, using methods like , , and so on. 如果该属性类型本身的代码加载到只反射上下文中，不能执行它。If the code for the attribute type itself is loaded into the reflection-only context, it cannot be executed. 结构由类以提供对为实例指定的自定义特性，而不执行自定义属性类型的相应属性的代码的命名自变量的访问。The structure is used by the class to provide access to a named argument specified for a custom attribute instance, without executing the code of the corresponding property of the custom attribute type. 属性返回结构，其中包含的类型和命名自变量的值。The property returns a structure that contains the type and value of the named argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 名为参数还是位置，你必须访问其类型和值使用结构。Whether an argument is named or positional, you must access its type and value by using the structure. 若要创建的实例类，而使用`static`工厂方法。To create instances of the class, use the `static` factory method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个具有四个构造函数与四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并且由使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性为读/写，并可以只能通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性为一个字符串，数组，一个命名的属性为整数的数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 在执行时，程序集将自身加载到只反射上下文，并显示有关已应用到它及的类型和成员，它包含自定义特性的信息。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays information about the custom attributes that were applied to it and to the type and members it contains. 应用于该类型的属性演示数组属性，使用位置和命名自变量。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个 结构，该结构可用于获取当前指定参数的类型和值。

span.span: Gets a structure that can be used to obtain the type and value of the current named argument.

value.span: 一个结构，可用于获取当前命名参数的类型和值。

span.span: A structure that can be used to obtain the type and value of the current named argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构仅包含有关如何设置参数值的信息。The structure only contains information about how the argument value was set. 此属性用于获取结构，其中包含的类型和值。Use this property to obtain a structure that contains the type and value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义使用四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following code example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并且由使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性为读/写，并可以只能通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性为一个字符串，数组，一个命名的属性为整数的数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 在执行时，程序集将自身加载到只反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的属性演示数组属性，使用位置和命名自变量。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 属性用于`ShowAttributeData`显示自定义属性数据时，若要获取的类型和值的方法名称的属性。The property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data, to obtain the types and values of named attributes. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]
